main event: Several witnesses observed a round, luminous object traveling very fast over Dodson, Montana, on February 22, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and luminous., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object was estimated to be about 200-300 yards in diameter., Witnesses reported the object moving at speeds of approximately 1000 miles per hour., The object eventually disappeared in a northerly direction.
witness description: A man and his companion driving in Dodson, Montana.
